And it's so nice and warm...\n

column7: NOTE: we open the game with yuna talking about how it's warm outside, and in the ending cutscene, after defeating all the bad guys and restoring life to the machinate planet, she's again marveling that it's "warm". i comment on this mostly because i didn't pick up on it until i'd played the game about ten times and almost translated this line in such a way as to remove the connection.

column7:
NOTE: Gyoza no Oushou ("Gyoza King") is a Japanese gyoza chain, parodied here as Gyoza no Moushou ("Great Gyoza General"). the other reference is to a "Fushimi Cake Store" that's probably parodying the Fujiya chain.
(the first japanese starbucks opened in tokyo in 1996 and the game came out in 1997, so my localization here is just barely not anachronistic)

column7: NOTE: i was baffled by this for a long time before eventually discovering it has a kanji error -- 兵糧責め should be 兵糧攻め

column6: From this moment forth, Earth is under the dominion of my Machinate Empire!
column7: NOTE: 機械化帝国: literally the "machinization empire", i.e. an "empire of turning things into machines". this is translated into english as "Technocracy" (or rather "Technocrasy") in some Japanese materials, but I feel this doesn't work well for various reasons and have gone with "Machinate" for 機械化 while keeping the "Empire" part as it is.

column7:
NOTE: this game is very sparing with the word "robot", using it only five times throughout the entire script despite the whole plot revolving around an invasion of alien robots. in this game, "robot" is used only in reference to the (non-sentient?) mecha soldiers, whereas the actual "living robot" characters are referred to as 機械 (machines), or coined terms like 機械人 (machine people). i've attempted to adhere to the same convention.
that said, the original game uses "machine" rather than "robot" here, but it's referring to the grunt troops, and i feel "robot" is more natural in english for this scenario.

column7: CHECK. the series' history heavily *suggests* that 暗黒の彼方 is referring to the queen of darkness, but this is not explicitly stated anywhere, and it's entirely possible this was meant to be the setup for a new villain in a future production which never came to be. in the interest of not introducing any potentially wrong assumptions, i'm avoiding any explicit reference to e.g. "her" here.

column7:
NOTE: i'll just make a note about the terminology here, since this is the first time it really comes up...

the enemy we are dealing with is the 機械化帝国 (kikaika teikoku = machinization empire, officially localized in some japanese materials as "technocracy" and here rendered as "machinate empire"). the inhabitants of this planet are 機械化人 (kikaikajin = machinization people, which i call "machinatians").

機械人 (kikaijin = machine person, which i've localized as "mechanima") is a coined term used in this game which seems to denote (certain kinds of?) humanoid robots. as i understand it, the 機械化人 are a kind of 機械人. (機械人 also appears to be an actual chinese word for "robot", though this is probably coincidental.)

to further confound the matter, yuri, a robot, is referred to as an "android" (アンドロイド). this seems to be regarded as a distinct existence from a 機械人, since we get people talking about how "you can't trust a 機械人" when yuri is standing right there. this is never really explored in detail, though.

...and also now that i FINALLY sit down and watch the ovas, misaki states that the youki sanshimai are 凶暴なアンドロイド (ferocious/brutal androids), which just further muddles things.

DIIIIIIIIIIIIIIE!!

column7:
NOTE: these are flashbacks to the ova, which i haven't watched... (i have a hard time believing that sweatdrop emote was part of the original script)
...okay i've watched them now, feeling more confident about this. context: yuna has just convinced ayako to stop going on a murder rampage at a hospital and everyone's kind of wary about her

column5:

column5:
あの子は犯罪者として
廃棄処分にされたの！

column7:
NOTE: for clarity and my own reference, here is the scene that leads up to this line, which also contains 100% of the information about the kikaika planet that is in the ova:

ユナ・ユーリィ・リア：妖機三姉妹！？
Yuna/Yuri/Lia: The Three Youki Sisters!?
ミサキ：ええ
　そのデータが評議会本部のメモリーバンクにあったわ
Misaki: Yes.
  That data was in the Galactic Union HQ's memory bank.
(showing what we would now call a tablet containing images of the sisters to Yuna)
ユナ：亜耶乎ちゃん！
Yuna: Ayako-chan!
リア：どうやら間違いなさそうね
　だけど何者なの？妖機三姉妹って
Lia: It doesn't look like there's room for doubt.
  But who are they, these Three Youki Sisters?
ミサキ：はるか宇宙のかなたにある機械化惑星で作られた凶暴なアンドロイドよ
　記録によれば、彼女達が母性を破壊しようとして、超新星に追放されたことになってるわ
Misaki: They're brutal androids created on the Kikaika [NOTE: mechanization, turning things into machines] planet in the far reaches of space.
  According to the records, they tried to destroy their homeworld, and were banished to a supernova.
ユナ：凶暴なアンドロイド！？
　亜耶乎ちゃんが！？
Yuna: A brutal android!?
  AYAKO!?
エルナー：でも、宇宙のかなたで廃棄されたはずのアンドロイドがどうしてここに！？
Elner: But what are androids that were supposed to have been disposed of in the depths of space doing here!?
ミサキ：何かの手違いで廃棄されなかったか、誰かが修復したのか、残念ながらそこまではあたしにも…
　だけど…
Misaki: Whether they weren't disposed of due to some kind of slip-up, or someone repaired them -- unfortunately, I [don't know] that either...
(Misaki draws her gun)
ユナ：ミ、ミサキちゃん！何する気！？
Yuna: M-Misaki-chan! What're you planning to do!?
ミサキ：分かったでしょ、ユナ！？
Misaki: Don't you get it, Yuna!?

column5:
存在が確認された以上　あたしは

破壊しなくてはならないわ!!

She may have been bad a long time ago!

column5:
でも　今の亜耶乎ちゃんは

column5: ユ…ユナ…　行っちゃ　ヤダ…

行かないよ！

ここにいるから!!

I won't!\n
I won't go anywhere!\n
I'm right here!

column5:

column6:
I won't leave you on your own!\n
NEVER!

ユナ……

Yuna...\n

column6: Yuna...

column6: Heh-heh...So this is where you were...

Now, come back...\n
To our land[nbsp]-- to the Machinate Empire...

I won't go back! I'm going to be with Yuna forever and ever!

違うよ！　ユナはアタシの

column5:

いいわ……

Such an unruly child...\n
Fine, then...

column5: や　やめて〜っ！

column5: ユナーーー！

column6: U-umm...

No, NOOOOOO!\n
I'm staying with Yuna!\n
I'm not going back to the Machinate Empire!

Ayako is mine!\n
Farewell, Earthlings!

I think so too.

I'm bringing it up on screen!

...you don't do something...this planet...

HAH-ha-ha...

column7: NOTE: erika and her group's abilities are derived from the princess, so naturally erika immediately leaps to its defense here. that erika and the 7 apparently have a happy and loyal relationship to princess mirage despite being forcibly impressed into her service is an interesting and surprisingly understated dynamic. maybe getting a cool robot suit makes up for everything.

People who've done nothing are the ones who'll take the consequences!

column6:
Whew...\n
Looks like we managed to make it in time!

column5:
ユナ……　私よ…
『蜃楼星』の敵は　片づけたわ！
column6:
Yuna, it's me...\n
I've taken care of the enemies on the Mirage Planet!

column5:
さっすが　ポリリーナ様❤
こっちもたった今　終わったトコです！
column6:
That's Polylina for you.[nbsp]❤\n
We've just finished up here, too!

column5: そう…作戦成功ね！
column6: I see...Mission accomplished, then!

column5: ユナさん……
column6: Yuna...

column5: プリンセス・ミラージュ！
column6: Princess Mirage!

column5:
このままでは
大変な事になるところでした…
本当にありがとう！
column6:
If you hadn't shown up, this would have become a grave affair...\n
Thank you, truly!

column5:
エンジンの調整が終わったら
すぐに追いかけますわ！
column6: I'll follow after you as soon as the engine repairs are finished!

column5:
うん　無事でよかったね
ミラージュ!!
column6: Okay. Glad you're safe, Mirage!

column5:
四天機といい　六花戦といい
機械化帝国って　性格悪いヤツばっか
なんじゃないの！
column6: The Four Heavenly Machinae, the Six Flower Warriors...Man, this Machinate Empire's just a pack of nasty lame-os!

column5:
部下が　あの調子だと
機械化皇帝は最悪ね！
column6: If the lackeys are this bad, that Machinate Emperor's got to be the worst!

column5:
奴…　いや　彼女も初めから
あのような野心家ではなかったのです…
column6: That knave...Pardon[nbsp]-- that woman did not harbor such sinister designs from the start.

column5:
彼女が以前のままであったなら
『妖機三姉妹』も生まれることは
なかったはず…
column6: Had she remained as she was, the Three Fey Machinae Sisters would never have been born...

column5: どーいうことなの　鏡明さん？
column6: What do you mean, Mr. Jing Ming?

column5:
機械化皇帝は優秀な指導者であり
また　天才的な科学者でもありました…
column6: The Machinate Emperor was both a brilliant leader as well as a genius scientist.

column5:
豹変した彼女は　その頭脳を駆使して
『妖機三姉妹』『四天機』…　そして
『六花戦』を創り上げたのです…
column6: Suddenly changing, she threw that intellect into creating the Three Fey Machinae Sisters, the Four Heavenly Machinae...and the Six Flower Warriors.

column5:
亜耶乎達は彼女の心の闇より
生まれた…　いわば心の分身…
column6: Ayako and her sisters were born of the darkness of her heart...They are her heart's alter egos, one could say.

column5:
機械化皇帝は　まさしく
彼女達の『母』なのです……
column6: The Machinate Emperor is nothing less than their ^mother~...

column5: そ　そんな事って……
column6: N-no way...

column5:
その昔　機械化皇帝は
『白皇帝・玉華様』とともに
我が帝国を治めていました……
column6: In the days of yore, the Machinate Emperor ruled our empire together with the White Emperor, Lady Yui Hua...

column5:
二人の統治による平和な時代は
いつまでも続くと思われました…
column6: From their rule, it was thought a peaceful era would continue forever.

column5:
だが…　彼女は　ある日突然
豹変した…
column6: And yet...One day, she suddenly changed.

column5:
冷酷な悪魔と化し　兵を率いて
銀河侵攻を始めたのです!!
column6: Transforming into a cold-hearted demon, she rallied troops and launched a galactic invasion!

column5: どうして　そんな事に？
column6: What could have caused that?

column5:
彼女は本当に素晴らしい
人物でした…　指導者としての器も
申し分なかった…
column6: She once was a truly magnificent individual...Her skills as a leader were beyond reproach.

column5:
だが　たった一つ　白皇帝・玉華様に
及ばぬ点があったのです…
column6: But there was just one aspect in which she could not equal White Emperor Lady Yui Hua...

column5:
人々を引きつける天賦の才……
『人望』……
column6:
The natural talent for drawing in the people...\n
^Respect~...

column5:
同じ指導者でありながら　民衆の
まなざしは玉華様に向けられてしまう…
column6: Though she was a leader just like her, the people's gaze was turned upon Lady Yui Hua.

column5:
決して埋めることの出来ぬ
僅かな差…　それが彼女の心に『闇』を
もたらしたのです!!
column6: A meager gap which could absolutely never be filled...That is what turned her heart to darkness!

column5: 嫉妬という心の闇を……
column6: To the darkness of an envious heart...

column5:
その結果　破壊された街と
累々たる死者の山という悲しい現実が
広がっていきました…
column6: Consequently, the sad reality of destroyed cities and heaping mountains of the dead spread...

column5:
そして…伝説の戦いが
始まったのね…
column6: And...the legendary battle began...

column5:
そう…　だが　我々は気づくのが
遅すぎた…　もっと早く気づくべき
だったのだ！
column6: Yes...But our comprehension dawned too late. We should have known sooner!

column5: 彼女の中に潜んでいた『心の闇』に…
column6: Known of the ^heart of darkness~ which lurked within her...

column5:
闇の力は　人の心に潜む
暗黒の部分を増幅させる…
column6: The power of darkness amplifies the lurking dark spaces of a person's heart...

column5:
み　みなさん[sweat]
そろそろ豪黒壁に到着します！
column6:
E-excuse me...[nbsp][sweat]\n
We'll be arriving at the Great Black Wall shortly!

column5:
着陸ポイント確認　ＯＫ…
着陸時のショックに注意してください！
column6:
Landing point confirmed OK...\n
Watch out for the landing shock!

column5: 亜耶乎に話しかける
column6: Talk to Ayako

column5: みんなを説得する
column6: Convince everybody

column5:
ここが『豪黒壁』？
古代神話にでも　出てきそうな所ね…
column6:
This is the Great Black Wall?\n
It looks like the kind of place that would be in an ancient myth...

column5:
ええ…
どこか神秘的で　ここだけ
時間が凍りついてしまったような…
column6:
Yes...\n
It's like this is somewhere mystical, and time has frozen here alone...

column5: あ　あれは!?
column6: Wh-what's that!?

column5:
『剣鳳』様の気を感じます！
やはり　あそこに
封じ込められているようです!!
column6: I sense the spirit of Lord Chun Fong! It seems he has indeed been sealed here!

column5:
あれは
普通の兵士ではない!?
column6: Those aren't the usual soldiers!?

column5:
おそらく
剣鳳様を封印しておくため
特別な役目を果たしているのです！
column6: They are probably carrying out special duties for the purpose of sealing Lord Chun Fong!

column5:
ということは
あの兵士達を倒せば……
column6: Which means if we defeat those troops...

column5:
はい…　剣鳳様を
救い出すことができるはず！
column6: Yes...We should be able to rescue Lord Chun Fong!

column5:
よぉ〜し　いくわよ！
剣鳳さんを早く　助け出してあげよう!!
column6:
All right, here we go!\n
Let's save Mr. Chun Fong, quick!

column5: タァーーーッ!!
column6: TAAAAAAAH!

column5: 『氷のミドリ』　ただいま参上！
column6: ^Icy Midori~ leaps forth!

column5: ミドリちゃん！
column6: Midori!

column5:
私の　超絶対零度の
つららの前では　誰もが無力…
それを思い知らせてあげるわ！
column6:
All are powerless before my icicles which exceed absolute zero...\n
That, I will make you realize!

column5:
よぉ〜し　残りは少ないわ…
すぐ　やっつけちゃうんだから！
column6:
Okay, not many left...\n
Let's take 'em out quick!

column5: もう　動けませんですぅ〜
column6: I am no longer able to move...

column5:
ごめんなさい〜〜〜〜〜
失礼します〜〜〜〜〜
column6:
I'm sooooorry...\n
Pardon meeeeee...

column5: なんでぇー　このあたしが〜〜
column6: How could this happen to, like, ME...?

column5: 次の幕まで退散しますわ…
column6: I'll be off until the next act...

column5: 修行が足りなかったアル…
column6: My training wasn't enough, that it wasn't...

column5:
役に立てなくてごめんね…
ユナ…
column6:
I'm sorry I couldn't be helpful...\n
Yuna...

column5: 花の命は　はかないものね…
column6: How fleeting is the life of a flower...

column5: クッ　油断しましたわ……
column6: Kh! I was careless...

column5:
わたくしの演奏は
終わりのようね…
column6: It looks like my performance is over...

column5:
私をここまで
追いつめるとは…
column6: How could I be driven up to the wall like this...?

column5:
今度　会ったら
ただじゃおかないから！
column6: I'm not letting you off easy next time we meet!

column5:
ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column5:
ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column5:
もう　戦えないみたいです…
ごめんなさい…
column6:
It seems I can no longer fight...\n
I'm sorry...

column5:
あたいもヤキが
まわったもんだゼ…
column6: Guess I've lost my edge...

column5: ごめんね…　ユナ……
column6: Sorry...Yuna...

column5: まだ　あたいは歌えるよ…
column6: I can still sing...

column5: ううっ…　燃え尽きたわ…
column6: Urgh...I'm all burned out...

column5: 次は絶対に負けねえぞ…
column6: I'm sure as hell not losing next time...

column5: 私がこの程度で…
column6: For I to fall to such...

column5: ごめんね…　油断しちゃった…
column6: I'm sorry...I messed up...

column5: しまった　油断した…
column6: Damn...I was careless...

column5: あたしが　こんなやつに…
column6: How could THEY get me...?

column5:
やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
ＥＳＰシールドが張られていて
テレポートできない！
column6: An ESP shield is active, making teleportation impossible!

column5:
剣鳳さんって　一体
どんな人なのかなぁ〜
ドキドキ！
column6:
Oh man, what kind of guy could this Chun Fong be?\n
(SUSPENSE!)
column7: NOTE: shut up, this is how i translated it in yuna 1

column5: 剣鳳様!!
column6: Lord Chun Fong!

column5:
おお　鏡明…　白香！
やはり　そなたたちであったか!!
かたじけない…
column6:
Ohh, Jing Ming...Pai Siang!\n
Of course 'twould be thee!\n
I am in thy debt...

column5:
いえ　私は何も……
これはみな　あの少女のおかげ！
column6:
No, not I...\n
It is all the fruit of this girl's labors!

column5:
光の救世主　神楽坂ユナさんです！
かくいう私も　彼女によって
助け出されたのです！
column6: This is Madam Yuna Kagurazaka, the Savior of Light! I was liberated by her in just such a manner!

column5: なんと　左様であったか！
column6: Beshrew me! Be this true!?

column5:
なんか
剣鳳さんの　しゃべり方って
時代劇みたいだねぇ〜
column6: The way Mr. Chun Fong talks is kinda like something from a period drama, huh...

column5:
ユーリィ
よく　わかんないですぅ[sweat]
column6: Yuri does not really understand.[nbsp][sweat]

column5:
これで三賢機の二人が
そろいました！
後は　白皇帝様を助け出せば…
column6:
With this, we have gathered two of the Three Wise Machinae!\n
Now, if we just rescue Her Ladyship the White Emperor...

column5: フ……フフ……
column6: Heh...Heh-heh...

column5: なに　今の声!?
column6: What was that voice!?

column5: 妖機三姉妹!!
column6: The Three Fey Machinae Sisters!
column7: NOTE: she says this despite the fact that it's just the two of them at this point

column5: お姉様!!
column6: Sisters!

column5:
フン！　裏切り者に
姉呼ばわりされる覚えは
ありませんわ……
column6: Hmph! I have no memory of a traitor sullying me with the title of ^Sister~...

column5: そ　そんな……
column6: N-no...

column5: さて　神楽坂ユナ！
column6: Now then[nbsp]-- Yuna Kagurazaka!

column5:
六花戦が全滅した今…
私達　そろそろ決着を
つけるべきだと思いましたの…
column6: Now that the Six Flower Warriors have been eradicated...I believe it is time we settled matters between ourselves.

column5:
そこで…
あなたに決闘を申し込むわ！
column6:
So...\n
We challenge you to a duel!

column5: け　けっとう〜!?
column6: D-duel!?

column5: 場所は流旋星『アレハテ』
column6: The place will be the Spiral Tide Planet ^Ruen.~
column7: NOTE: 流 = current (e.g. water), 旋 = rotate. it's a map whose gimmick is currents that suck you in and spit you out somewhere else, which is where the planet's title is coming from.

column5:
一対二では　かわいそうね…
もう一人……そう　妙な仮面をつけた
あなたも一緒に来るがいいわ!!
column6: Two against one would be pathetic, wouldn't it? Then one more...Yes. You in the strange mask over there[nbsp]-- come as well!

column5: わ　私!?
column6: M-me!?

column5:
正々堂々　二対二の決闘…
せいぜい　仲間との別れを惜しんでから
おいでなさい…
column6: A duel, two-on-two, fair and square...Come, once you have bid your tearful goodbyes to your comrades...

column5: では……待っているぞ…
column6: Well then...We will be waiting...

column5:
ワナね!!
彼女達の卑劣な手口に
何度　だまされたことか……
column6:
It's a trap!\n
How many times have we been taken in by their despicable tricks...?

column5:
行くことないわよ！
ほっときゃいいって！
column6:
You don't need to go!\n
You can totally blow 'em off!

column5: ユナ……
column6: Yuna...

column5:
みんな　聞いて！
あたし……やっぱり行く！
行って……二人を説得してみる!!
column6:
Guys, listen!\n
I...I'm going, of course!\n
I'll go...and I'll try to convince them!

column5: ユナ!?
column6: Yuna!?

column5:
な　なに　言ってんのよぉ！
前にも　それで失敗してんでしょ!?
column6:
Wh-what're you talking about!?\n
It didn't work last time, did it!?

column5: 危険すぎるわ！
column6: It's too dangerous!

column5:
亜耶乎ちゃん　大丈夫！
あたしを信用して!!
column6:
It's fine, Ayako!\n
Trust me!

column5:
お姉さん達　必ず
連れて帰ってくるから…
column6: I'll definitely come back with your sisters with me...

column5:
みんな　心配してくれて
ありがと……
column6: Thanks for worrying about me, everybody...

column5:
でもね……
きっと　分かってくれると思うんだ！
だって……
column6:
But, see...\n
I'm sure they'll understand!\n
Because...

column5:
亜耶乎ちゃんは
分かってくれたもん…
column6: Because Ayako understood...

column5:
お姉さん達とだって　きっときっと
仲良くなれるはずだよ！
column6: Her sisters should definitely, DEFINITELY be able to become our friends too!

column5: ユナ……
column6: Yuna...

column5:
まったく……
あなたって子は……
column6:
Geez...\n
I don't believe you sometimes...

column5:
分かった！
私も協力するわ!!
column6:
Got it!\n
I'll be right beside you!

column5: ポリリーナ様❤
column6: Polylina![nbsp]❤

column5:
二人とも
くれぐれも油断しないでくださいね…
column6: The both of you, seriously, don't be careless...

column5:
大丈夫!!
それじゃ　行ってくるね！
column6:
It'll be fine!\n
Well, we'll be back!

column5: 亜耶乎に話しかける
column6: Talk to Ayako

column5: みんなを説得する
column6: Convince everybody

column5: ホホホホホ……
column6: Ho-ho-ho-ho-ho...

column5:
お待たせしましたわね…
私は『高貴な沙雪華』と申します！
column6:
I have kept you waiting, have I not...?\n
I am called ^Sayuka the Noble~!

column5: 沙雪華ちゃん！
column6: Sayuka!

column5: 久々の戦いね……
column6: My first battle in some time, hmm...

column5:

どうして　お嬢様の中のお嬢様である
私の出番がこんなに少ないのかしら？

敵は目の前なんだから〜[sweat]

私の実力を　世間一般に
再確認させてあげますわ!!
column6:

I shall let society once more affirm my true strength!

I'm sorry...\n
I couldn't take vengenace for you...

衛星軌道上にプリンセス号が

column7: NOTE: apparently the princess is considered an animate being (it gets "inai" instead of "nai" here)

column5: みんな…みんな　助かったのね！
column6: Guys...Guys, you're safe!

column5:
ええ！　
空間の狭間をさまよっているところを

Yep!\n
Thanks to Princess Mirage, who showed up right as we were teetering on the brink of space!
column7:
NOTE: i puzzled over this for a while before realizing the に is connecting back to yuna's 助かった in the previous sentence to indicate who saved them: "you were saved!" "yep, by princess mirage!".
CHECK: i'm still not really sure what 空間の狭間 is supposed to mean, though...生死の狭間をさまよう means "to hover between life and death" (e.g. due to a severe injury), but i'm not sure how you'd apply that to 空間 here. this is my best guess.

column5:
ユナさんの元に
駆けつける最中　あんな所でみなさんに

何者に対しても分け隔てのない

column7: NOTE: yuna's sentiment here is hard to get in english smoothly. the idea is "you're depending on me to help you, but i too am depending on you to help me, so please do", but this doesn't compact as easily as it does in japanese.

column5: ユナ殿……
column6: Milady Yuna...
column7: NOTE: Chun Fong's name is erroneously written as 剣凰 here (using the kanji 凰, the female Chinese firebird, instead of 鳳, the male equivalent). perhaps this was an earlier name for the character that was changed later in development? this mistake happens again on at two other occasions, so i'm surprised they never noticed it, especially in this port that came out months after the original...

Hang in there!

ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column5:
ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column5:
もう　戦えないみたいです…
ごめんなさい…
column6:
It seems I can no longer fight...\n
I'm sorry...

column5:
あたいもヤキが
まわったもんだゼ…
column6: Guess I've lost my edge...

column5: ごめんね…　ユナ……
column6: Sorry...Yuna...

column5: まだ　あたいは歌えるよ…
column6: I can still sing...

column5: ううっ…　燃え尽きたわ…
column6: Urgh...I'm all burned out...

column5: 次は絶対に負けねえぞ…
column6: I'm sure as hell not losing next time...

column5: 私がこの程度で…
column6: For I to fall to such...

column5: ごめんね…　油断しちゃった…
column6: I'm sorry...I messed up...

column5: ひとまず　退散いたす…
column6: I shall withdraw for the present...

column5: 私の実力はこの程度では……
column6: My true power, done in by such lowliness...

column5: しまった　油断した…
column6: Damn...I was careless...

column5: あたしが　こんなやつに…
column6: How could THEY get me...?

column5: ごめんなさい…失礼します…
column6: I'm sorry...Pardon me...

column5: この私がやられるなんて……
column6: Can't believe they took ME out...

column5:
やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
わ　私は　
なにがあろうと皇帝陛下に…！
column6: C-come what may, I will stand by Her Imperial Majesty...!

column5:
玉華様！
あぁ　よくご無事で…
column6:
Lady Yui Hua!\n
Oh, I'm relieved you're safe...

column5:
白香……心配をかけましたね…
剣鳳…鏡明…あなた達もよく無事で…
column6: Pai Siang...I've made you worry, haven't I? Chun Fong...Jing Ming...I'm glad you're safe, too...

column5:
いえ…私達が
今　ここにいるのも　全て　ユナさんの
お力添えが　あったからなのです…
column6: No...That we are here now, we owe entirely to the assistance of Madam Yuna...

column5:
ユナさん……
私　あなたのことは
よく存じております…
column6:
Madam Yuna...\n
I know much of you...

column5:
この度は　私どものために
ご尽力いただき
感謝の念にたえません…
column6: No expression of gratitude will suffice now for the efforts you have put forward for our sakes...

column5:
や　やだなぁ…感謝だなんて…
当たり前のことしてるだけだもん…
column6: Oh, it doesn't matter...gratitude, I mean...I'm just doing what's natural, after all.

column5:
それにまだ全部
終わったわけじゃないから…
column6: And besides, it's not all over yet...

column5:
では　やはり
機械化皇帝を　倒すために……
column6: Then in order to defeat the Machinate Emperor, you really will...

column5:
ううん……
あたし　こんなこと　やめるように
皇帝さんを説得してみる！
column6:
No...\n
I'm going to convince the Emperor to stop doing things like this!

column5: えっ!?　説得？
column6: What!? Convince?

column5:
そうだよ…
鏡明さんから聞いたんだ……
皇帝さんも昔はいい人だったって…
column6:
That's right...\n
Mr. Jing Ming told me how the Emperor used to be a good person...

column5:
だから説得したら
きっと分かってくれると思うんだ！
column6: So if I try to convince her, I'm sure she'll understand!

column5:
もう手遅れです……
彼女の心は完全に　闇の力に
支配されてしまっているのです……
column6:
It's too late for that now...\n
Her heart is entirely under the control of the power of darkness...

column5:
そんな……どうして？
やってみなくちゃ分かんないよ！
column6:
No way...Why?\n
We'll never know if we don't try!

column5:
いいえ…いかに光の力を
もってしても　彼女の心の闇を
払うことはできないでしょう…
column6: No...No matter how much power of light you hold, you cannot wipe away the darkness in her heart...

column5:
それほど深い傷を
私は彼女の心に
与えてしまったのですから……
column6: After all, I am the one who made such deep wounds in it...

column5:
とにかく
彼女のもとへ向かいましょう……
column6: In any case, let's go to her...

column5:
どこかに
エレベーターの扉を開く
スイッチがあるはずです！
column6: There should be a switch somewhere to open the elevator door!

column5: ジャンボケーキを獲得した
column6: Jumbo Cake acquired.

column5: アロエエキスを獲得した
column6: Aloe Extract acquired.

column5: て　敵があらわれました!?
column6: E-enemies appeared!?

column5:
やっぱり　落ちてるモノを
もらっちゃうのは　マズかったかなぁ[sweat]
column6: Yep, taking stuff off the floor wasn't the best idea...[nbsp][sweat]

column5: もう　動けませんですぅ〜
column6: I am no longer able to move...

column5:
ごめんなさい〜〜〜〜〜
失礼します〜〜〜〜〜
column6:
I'm sooooorry...\n
Pardon meeeeee...

column5: なんでぇー　このあたしが〜〜
column6: How could this happen to, like, ME...?

column5: 次の幕まで退散しますわ…
column6: I'll be off until the next act...

column5: 修行が足りなかったアル…
column6: My training wasn't enough, that it wasn't...

column5:
役に立てなくてごめんね…
ユナ…
column6:
I'm sorry I couldn't be helpful...\n
Yuna...

column5: 花の命は　はかないものね…
column6: How fleeting is the life of a flower...

column5: クッ　油断しましたわ……
column6: Kh! I was careless...

column5:
わたくしの演奏は
終わりのようね…
column6: It looks like my performance is over...

column5:
私をここまで
追いつめるとは…
column6: How could I be driven up to the wall like this...?

column5:
今度　会ったら
ただじゃおかないから！
column6: I'm not letting you off easy next time we meet!

column5:
ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column6: Can't believe they took ME out...

column5:
やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
なんか　やたら暗くて
ジメジメしたトコねぇ…
column6: Kind of a dim and gloomy place, huh...

column5:
ここは
傷ついた機械人を直すための
部屋でした……
column6: This was a room for healing wounded mechanimae...

column5:
今は　機械化皇帝が
機械人を改造する部屋に……
column6: Now, it's a place for the Machinate Emperor to remodel them...

column5:
役に立ちそうなモノが
たくさん　ありますねぇ…
column6: There are many things which look like they may be useful...

column5:
あ　あのスイッチは!?
ユナさん　あれがエレベーターの
扉を開くスイッチです!!
column6:
Ah! That switch...!?\n
Madam Yuna, that's the switch to open the elevator door!

column5:
でも　スイッチの回りに
バリアが張られている…
column6: But there's a barrier around it...

column5:
あれは　サイコバリア…
それならば　私がなんとか…
column6:
That's a psychic barrier...\n
Then perhaps I can somehow...
column7: NOTE: literally "psychobarrier" -- the japanese have come to misuse the english word "psycho"

column5:
ユナ　用心してください!!
この部屋には　他にも
不気味な思念が　渦巻いている……
column6:
Yuna, be on guard!\n
In this room, there are even more ghastly thoughts whirling about...

column5: なにか　ワナがあるかもしれません…
column6: There may be some kind of trap...

column5: わかったわ　エルナー！
column6: Got it, Elner!

column6: I am no longer able to move...

やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
ＥＳＰシールドが張られていて
テレポートできない！
column6: An ESP shield is active, making teleportation impossible!

column5: ユナさん　スイッチを！
column6: Madam Yuna, the switch!

column5:
これで最上階への
エレベーターに乗ることができる！
さぁ　行きましょう！
column6:
Now we'll be able to take the elevator to the highest floor!\n
Come[nbsp]-- let's go!

column5:
この上に
機械化皇帝がいる!!
column6: The Machinate Emperor is above us!

column5:
ついに　ここまで
やって来たのね！
column6: At last, we've made it all the way here!

column5: どうしたんですか　玉華さん？
column6: What's wrong, Miss Yui Hua?

column5:
ユナさん……
実は　お話しなければ
ならないことがあるのです…
column6:
Madam Yuna...\n
In truth, there is something I must tell you about...

column5:
私と機械化皇帝の間にあった
過去の話を……
column6: The tale of the past which transpired between the Machinate Emperor and I...

column5: 過去の……？
column6: The past...?

column5:
昔　我が国に
侵攻を企む惑星が　ありました…
column6: Once, there was a planet which schemed to invade our country.

column5:
そのとき　私達は
ある決断を迫られたのです……
column6: At that time, we were forced to make a certain decision...

column5:
なぜだ!?　なぜ
戦ってはならぬ!?
column6: Why!? Why will you not fight!?

column5:
今　戦えば　多くの血が
流れることになります!!
column6: If we fight now, much blood will be spilled!

column5:
それだけは　どうしても避けねば
ならないのです！
column6: At all costs, we must avoid that!

column5:
しかし　今　敵を退けねば
更に多くの血が流れる事になるのだ！
おまえは　それでもよいと!?
column6: But if we do not drive off the enemy now, far more blood will be shed! Do you tell me that is your wish!?

column5:
そうならないために　早々に
和議を申し立てたのです！
column6: I declared a peace conference swiftly so that it might never come to that!

column5:
一刻も早い　戦いの終結が
両国の民を救うのですから！
column6: An immediate end to the conflict will save the people of both nations!

column5:
何を悠長なことを…！
おまえが言っている事は　きれい事に
すぎない！
column6:
What is this naivete...!?\n
You offer nothing more than pretty words!

column5: 敵は目前に迫っているのだぞ!!
column6: The enemy has drawn right before our eyes!

column5:
私は　この国を統べる者として
皆の命を守らねばなりません！
そのためには…
column6:
As one who rules this country, I must protect the lives of all the people!\n
And so...

column5: 話にならん…　失礼する！
column6: This discussion is futile...Goodbye!

column5:
落ち着きなさい！
冷静によく考えてくだされ！
column6:
Calm thyself!\n
Please consider this with a level head!

column5: ふん!!
column6: Hmph!

column5: お待ちなさい！
column6: Stop!

column5: 何のマネだ……
column6: What's the meaning of this...?

column5: 勝手な振る舞い　許しません！
column6: I won't allow you to simply do as you please!

column5:
私に剣を向けるのか？
この私に対して…
column6:
You turn your sword upon me?\n
Upon ME...

column5:
玉華様　落ち着いてください！
ここは軍議の場なのです！
黒皇帝殿も　席に戻られよ！
column6: Lady Yui Hua, please calm down! This is a war council! Lady Black Emperor, return to your seat as well!

column5: それで満足か？　玉華よ…
column6: Will this satisfy you, Yui Hua...?

column5:
己の意にそぐわぬ者には力で
服従させる……
column6: Those who suit not your will, you submit by force...

column5: 貴様も私と変わらぬではないか！
column6: You are no different from me, are you!?

column5: それは……
column6: That's...

column5:
それは違います！　白皇帝様は
己を見失った黒皇帝殿を…
column6: That's wrong! Lady White Emperor stands against the Black Emperor, who has lost sight of us...
column7: NOTE: no verb in this sentence, what this person is actually saying Yui Hua did or does or should do to the black emperor is unknowable.

column5:
そうですぞ！　あくまでも
白皇帝様は…
column6: Indeed! To the last, the White Emperor has...

column5:
黙れ!!　クッ…！　なぜだ！
なぜ　いつもいつも貴様という奴は…
column6:
Silence! Kh...! Why!?\n
Why are you always, always, ALWAYS...!?

column5:
なぜ　貴様ばかりが認められ
私が退かねばならぬのだ!?
column6: Why are YOU the only one recognized, while I must concede!?

column5:
なぜ　貴様ばかりが欲しい物を
手にすることができるのだ!?
私の何が劣っているのだ!?
column6:
Why are YOU the only one who can get what she wants!?\n
What about me is inferior!?

column5: そ　そんな……

所詮　我らは相いれぬ存在…
ならば　私は私の道を行く!!
column6:
We are existentially conflicting things...\n
In that case, I will walk my own path!

column5:
もし　おまえが私の行く手を阻むなら
その時は容赦はせぬ…
column6: Should you obstruct my affairs, I will show no mercy...

column5: さらばだ!!
column6: Farewell!

column5:
待って　玉鷲！
玉鷲ーーーーーっ!!
column6:
Wait, Yui Jiou!\n
YUI JIOU...!
column7: NOTE: it was surprisingly difficult to find some sort of official english reading for 玉鷲, considering how readily romanized names are available for most of the chinese-named characters; she's one of the only characters in the series who doesn't get a profile in the 1999 artbook, and her trading card in this game lists her as "ji sieh", which apparently corresponds to some part of her title. the IRL collectible card set, however, gives her name as "yui-jiow", while the artbook has "yui jiou". "jiow" isn't standard pinyin, at least from what i can gather knowing no chinese, so i'm going with "jiou", which seems to at least be consistent with how liou li's name is written in english in this game.

column5:
結果として
私は彼女に　剣を向けてしまった…
column6: As a result, I turned my sword upon her...

column5:
あの時から
彼女は変わってしまったのです……
column6: From that time on, she changed...

column5: 玉華様……
column6: Lady Yui Hua...

column5:
あたし　やだよ!!
そんなことで争っても
いいことなんて　ひとつもないよ!!
column6:
I hate this!\n
Nothing good will EVER come of fighting over something like that!

column5: ユナさん……あなたは……
column6: Madam Yuna...You...

column5:
あたし　絶対に皇帝さんを
元に戻してみせる!!
column6: I absolutely WILL return the Emperor to normal!

column5:
皇帝さんを信じて
死んでいった人達のためにも!!
column6: For the sake of the people who believed in her and died, too!

column5: こ　これは……
column6: Th-this is...

column5:
玉華よ…
なぜ　あんなことを…
私が必要ではないというのか……
column6:
Yui Hua...\n
Why did you...?\n
Are you saying there is no need for me...?

column5:
戦いには　理屈や
きれいごとなどは通用しない……
和議などと生ぬるいことを…
column6:
Such fallacious arguments and lip service do not apply to war...\n
Babbling of peace conferences, of half-baked nonsense...

column5:
そんなことをすれば
敵につけこまれるだけ…
そんなこともわからんのか！
column6:
Should we do that, we will only be exploited by the enemy...\n
Do you not understand!?

column5:
ならば私が証明してやる!!
勝者こそすべて…
力こそ正義だということを!!
column6:
Then I will prove it to you!\n
That it is the winner that takes all...\n
That it is power that is justice!

column5:
おぉ　我が子よ…
お前に素晴らしい力を与えてやる……
column6:
Oh, my child...\n
I will give you such wonderful power...

column5:
玉華がいない今
お前こそ私の唯一の理解者だ……
名前は………………………『白香』！
column6:
With Yui Hua now gone, you are the only one who understands me...\n
Your name shall be...\n
.......................................^Pai Siang~!

column6: I am no longer able to move...

column5: ひとまず　退散いたす…
column6: I shall withdraw for the present...

column5: 私の実力はこの程度では……
column6: My true power, done in by such lowliness...

column5: しまった　油断した…

column6: How could THEY get me...?

column5: ごめんなさい…失礼します…
column6: I'm sorry...Pardon me...

column6: Can't believe they took ME out...

column5:
やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
なぜ　わからないのです！
昔のあなたは　こんな人では
なかったはず!!
column6:
Why don't you understand!?\n
You weren't like this before!

column5:
フッ…そうだ…
昔の私は　貴様に利用されるだけの
人形でしかなかった…
column6:
Heh...That's right...\n
Before, I was but a puppet dancing on your strings...

column5:
しかし　今は違う…私が組織する軍は
貴様の勢力を　はるかに上回った!!
この銀河を手中にできるほどにな!!
column6:
But now, things are different...\n
The troops I have amassed have far surpassed your might! So far as to be able to seize control of this galaxy!

column5:
目を覚ますのです!!
昔のように協力して国を治めれば……
column6:
Open your eyes!\n
If we cooperate to rule to country as we once did...

column5:
ハッハッハッハッ…
バカなことを!!
column6:
Ha-ha-ha-ha...\n
What nonsense!

column5:
すでに我が軍は銀河征服に向かった…
今頃　銀河では　かつてない戦火が
広がっているはず!!
column6: My forces have already begun their galactic conquest...At this moment, horrors of war beyond any before seen are spreading across the galaxy!

column5:
なぜ　そんなことを……
許せない……
column6:
How could you...?\n
You're beyond redemption...

column5: 玉華様!!
column6: Lady Yui Hua!

column5:
私には　
あなたを殺すことはできません……
ならば…
column6:
I cannot kill you...\n
So...

column5: 玉華　貴様っ!?
column6: Yui Hua, you--!?

column5:
剣鳳　鏡明!!
位置につきなさい!!
column6:
Chun Fong! Jing Ming!\n
In position!

column5: し　しかし……
column6: B-but...

column5: これは命令です!!
column6: This is an order!

column5:
や　やめろーーーっ！
グァーーーーッ!!
column6:
S-stoooooop!\n
GWAAAAAAA--!!

column5: 玉鷲……ごめんなさい……
column6: Yui Jiou...I'm sorry...

column5: もう　動けませんですぅ〜
column6: I am no longer able to move...

column5:
ごめんなさい〜〜〜〜〜
失礼します〜〜〜〜〜
column6:
I'm sooooorry...\n
Pardon meeeeee...

column5: なんでぇー　このあたしが〜〜
column6: How could this happen to, like, ME...?

column5: 次の幕まで退散しますわ…
column6: I'll be off until the next act...

column5: 修行が足りなかったアル…
column6: My training wasn't enough, that it wasn't...

column5:
役に立てなくてごめんね…
ユナ…

Yuna...

column6: How fleeting is the life of a flower...

column6: Kh! I was careless...

終わりのようね…
column6: It looks like my performance is over...

column5:
私をここまで
追いつめるとは…
column6: How could I be driven up to the wall like this...?

column5:

ただじゃおかないから！
column6: I'm not letting you off easy next time we meet!

column5:
どうすれば
ここから出られるのだ…
column6: What can I do to be able to leave this place...?

column5: 必ず…どこかに出口があるはず…
column6: Surely...there must be a way out somewhere...

column5:
誰だ!?
今　私に話しかけた者は…
姿を現せ!!
column6:
Who's there!?\n
You who called to me now...\n
Show yourself!

column5: き　貴様は何者だ!?
column6: Wh-who are you!?

column5:
ここからは出られん!?
一体　どういうことだ!?
column6:
I cannot leave this place!?\n
What is the meaning of this!?

column5:
ここが完全な閉鎖空間だというのか！
そんなはずはない……
そんなはずは……
column6:
You are saying this is an entirely closed space!?\n
That cannot be...\n
That cannot...

column5:
条件!?　なんのことだ!!
貴様に　そんな力があるというのか!?
column6:
Conditions!? What are they!?\n
Are you telling me you hold such power!?

column5:
愛情　信頼……あらゆる善の魂？
今の私には無用のものだ!!
column6:
Love, trust...all the goodness of my soul?\n
All are needless to me now!
column7: CHECK あらゆる善の魂. i really, really want to say that this is talking about the goodness of the emperor's soul; it makes much more sense with the line that follows. but absent that, i think the normal interpretation would be "all virtuous souls", which is plausible (given her subsequent galactic death rampage) but more puzzling.

column5:
ここから出られるのなら
私は　喜んで魂を捧げよう!!
column6: If I will be able to leave this place, I gladly offer my soul to you!

column5: こ　この力は!?
column6: Th-this power...!?

column5:
光…!?
外の世界だ!!
column6:
Light...!?\n
The outside world!

column5:
もう　なにを言っても
ムダなのですね……
column6: So it no longer matters what I say...

column5:
あなたの望む通りに
この星は　あなたのものとなった……
column6: As you wished, the planet has become yours...

column5:
でも　この殺伐とした世界の
どこがいいというのです!!
column6: But what about this savage world can you call good!?

column5:
皇帝陛下!!
反乱分子どもは　仰せの通りに
皆殺しにいたしました！
column6:
Your Imperial Majesty!\n
Per your orders, we have entirely slain the insurrectionist elements!

三賢機の『鏡明』『剣鳳』も
手はず通りに!!
裏切者の『白香』も間もなく！

column5: 鏡明　剣鳳までが!?
column6: Even Jing Ming and Chun Fong!?

column5:
フフフ…
全てが私の思い通りに…
column6:
Heh-heh-heh...\n
All is proceeding to my satisfaction...

column5:
玉華よ……
まだまだ　こんなものではないぞ…
全てを奪ってやる…
column6:
Yui Hua...\n
This is not the end...\n
I will take away all...

column5:
貴様は　朽ち果てるまで
ここで過ごすのだ!!
column6: You will pass your days here until you rot to nothing!

みんな　ごめんね…

Sorry, guys...

column5:
どうして　
地球などという　くだらぬ星を……
皇帝陛下は…
column6: Why has Her Imperial Majesty ordered it...for an insignificant world like Earth...?

column5:
わからない……
そんな銀河の辺境にある星など
なんのために……
column6:
I don't know...\n
Why this for some planet out in the boonies of the galaxy...?

column5:
さしたる文明があるわけでなし…
我が帝国の　脅威になるとも思えない…
column6: It's not like it has any notable civilization...I can't imagine it'll be any threat to our empire...

column5: シッ…　皇帝陛下が…
column6: Shh...It's Her Imperial Majesty...

column5:
天火の発射準備は
できたか？
column6: Have you finished preparations for the Heavenfire's launch?

column5: ハッ…準備は完了しております！
column6: Aye! Preparations are complete!

column5:
陛下…
お聞きしてもよろしいでしょうか…
なぜ　そのような星に天火を？
column6:
Your Majesty...\n
If I may so humbly ask...\n
Why are you using the Heavenfire on such a planet?

column5:
フフフ…
地球には　光や愛などといった
くだらん幻想が満ちあふれている…
column6:
Heh-heh-heh...\n
Earth is awash in such trifling delusions as ^light~ and ^love~...

column5: 我が銀河には　そんなものは無用だ!!
column6: My galaxy has no need for such things!

column5:
決して容赦するな！
地球の民を　根絶やしにするのだ!!
column6: Show not a shred of mercy! Utterly eradicate the people of Earth!

column5:
この部屋……
血の匂いがする
column6:
This room...\n
It smells of blood.

column5:
よくぞ　ここまで来た…
神楽坂ユナ！
column6:
How well you've done, making it this far...\n
Yuna Kagurazaka!

column5:
機械化皇帝……
どこに!?
column6:
The Machinate Emperor...\n
Where--!?

column5: 皇帝……さん……
column6: Emperor...

column5:
久しいな…玉華よ……
生きておったか…
column6:
How long it has been, Yui Hua...\n
So you were alive...

column5:
フフフ…
ここで血を流した先人達のように
貴様らも　処刑してくれるわ!!
column6:
Heh-heh-heh...\n
Here, like those whose blood I once spilled, you, too, I shall execute!

column5: いでよ!!
column6: Come forth!

column5: し　四天機!?
column6: Th-the Four Heavenly Machinae!?

column5:
そこにいるのは
以前の四天機ではないわ！
column6: Those aren't the Four Heavenly Machinae from before!

column5:
察しがいいな…
こ奴らは　より強力な
戦闘マシーンとして再生した！
column6:
You guess rightly...\n
They have been reborn as combat machines, stronger than before!

column5:
せ　戦闘マシーン!?
四天機は　あなたの腹心の部下！
それをなぜ!?
column6:
C-combat machines!?\n
The Four Heavenly Machinae are your trusted confidants! Why would you do this!?

column5: なにを驚く？
column6: Why are you surprised?

column5:
しょせん　こ奴らは機械の身体に
かりそめの命を吹き込まれた
人形にすぎぬのだ…
column6: They are nothing more than puppets into whose mechanical bodies has been breathed a fleeting life.

column5:
違う　違うよ!!
電子レンジやテレビじゃないんだから！
みんな　生きてるんだよ！
column6:
No! You're wrong!\n
They're not TVs or microwaves!\n
They're all alive!

column5: あったかい心を持っているんだよ!!
column6: They have warm hearts!

column5:
フッ…
心など　戦いには無用…
column6:
Heh...\n
A ^heart~ is no use for fighting...

column5:
戦士として生まれた
こ奴らに　そのようなものは必要ない！
column6: They, who were born as warriors, have no need for such a thing!

column5:
フフフフッ……
さぁ　奴らの首を
私の前に捧げるのだ!!
column6:
Heh-heh-heh-heh...\n
Now, offer your necks before me!

column5:
やめてーっ!!
お願いっ!!　元に戻してあげて！
可哀想だよ！
column6:
STOP!\n
Please! Turn them back to normal!\n
This is miserable!

column5:
それならば
奴らを　もう一度　倒すことだな…
その時は再び　私が作り直してやる…
column6:
Then defeat them once more...\n
And then I will create them anew...

column5:
ひどい　ひどいよ……
こんなのってないよーーー!!
column6:
You're awful...awful...\n
You can't do this...!

column5: この私がやられるなんて……
column6: Can't believe they took ME out...

column5:
やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
戻りたかった…
平和だった　あの頃に……
column6:
I wanted to go back...\n
To those peaceful days...

column5:
どうして……
私は　いつから戦っていたのだ!?
column6:
Why...?\n
How long have I been fighting!?

column5:
はっ……
なぜ　わらわは　こんな所に……
column6:
Ha...\n
What am I doing here...?

column5: 皇帝陛下を……頼む……
column6: Please take care of...Her Imperial Majesty...

column5:
ユナ！
落ち込んでるヒマはありませんよ！
column6:
Yuna!\n
We don't have time to feel sorrowful!

column5: この先が『皇帝の間』!!
column6: This way is the Emperor's Chamber!

column5:
とうとう
ここまで来たのね……！
column6: We've finally made it here...!

column5: お姉さま　見ててネ…！
column6: Watch over me, Sisters...!

column5: 目の前に機械化皇帝がいる…！
column6: The Machinate Emperor lies just before us...!

column5: いざ　参らん!!
column6: Now, forward!

column5:
さぁ　ユナ…
行きましょう！
column6:
Okay, Yuna...\n
Let's go!

column5:
あなたに思いを託して
消えていった人のためにも!!
column6: For the sake of the departed who entrusted their wishes to you!

column5: うん!!
column6: Right!

column5: みんな　行こう!!
column6: Everybody...Let's go!

column5:
相変わらずだな　玉華よ…
友だ仲間だと　惰弱なことを…
column6:
You never change, do you, Yui Hua...\n
Talking of friends, comrades[nbsp]-- such weak-willed things...

column5:
お願い　皇帝さん！
もうムダな戦いは　やめて！
column6:
Please, Emperor!\n
Stop this useless fighting!

column5:
六花戦や四天機のみんな…
それに亜耶乎ちゃんのお姉さん達…
みんな　死んじゃったよ！
column6: All of the Six Flower Warriors and the Four Heavenly Machinae...And Ayako's sisters...They're all dead!

column5: 一人で戦っても　しょうがないよ！
column6: Even if you fight by yourself, there's no point!

column5:
フッ…　私には最初から
仲間などおらぬ…
column6: Heh...I have had no comrades from the beginning.

column5: 誰が死のうと　私には関係のない事…
column6: Who lives and who dies is no matter of mine...

column5:
そんな！　それじゃ
お姉様達は何のために戦ったの!?
column6: How could you!? Then what were my sisters fighting for!?

column5:
あんな姿になってまで戦った
六花戦や四天機は　一体何だったの!?
column6: What were the Six Flower Warriors and Four Heavenly Machinae, who fought and fought until they turned into THAT!?

column5:
奴等のかわりなど
いくらでもいる…
column6: I have as many replacements for them as I like.

column5: 壊れたら　また作り直せばよいのだ…
column6: If they are destroyed, I need only recreate them...

column5:
ひどい…　ひどいよ！
お姉様は　お姉様はこんな奴のために…
column6:
You're horrible...\n
You're HORRIBLE! My sisters...my sisters fought for someone like YOU...

column5: 涙とは…
column6: Tears...

column5: 亜耶乎ちゃん!!
column6: Ayako!

column5: 哀しみか……
column6: Are you sad...?

column5:
おまえのどこかにそのような感情が
あったのかと思うと　虫酸が走るわ！
column6: Thinking such emotions might have lain somewhere within you disgusts me!

column5:
自分が創りだした
亜耶乎に対して　なんてことを!?
column6: How could you do that to Ayako when you made her yourself!?

column5: しっかりするですぅ！
column6: Please pull yourself together!

column5: うん……
column6: Ugh...

column5:
皇帝さん　あなたは何のために
戦ってるの？
column6: Emperor, what are you fighting for?

column5: ナニ…？
column6: What...?

column5:
誰もいない銀河を征服して
それで満足なの？
column6: Will you be satisfied ruling over a galaxy with nobody in it?

column5:
一緒に喜ぶ仲間もいなくて
それでホントに幸せなの？
column6: Will you really be happy with no friends to share pleasure with?

column5:
一緒に泣いたり　笑ったり…
怒ったり　喜んだりできる友達も
いないなんて…
column6:
No friends to laugh with, cry with...\n
Get angry or be happy with...

column5:
そんなの悲しいよ…　一人っきりで
幸せになんかなれないよ……
column6: It's so sad...You can't be happy just by yourself...

column5:
言いたいことは
それだけか？　ならば……
column6:
Is that all you wish to say?\n
Then...

column5: 死ねいっ!!
column6: DIE!
column7: NOTE: this box disappears as soon as the text finishes printing, which makes it too hard to read in the translation as-is; i've added some space padding at the end as a hack to make it show for longer

column5: 玉華さん!!
column6: Miss Yui Hua!

column5: もう　やめて玉鷲…
column6: Stop, Yui Jiou...

column5:
お願い　もう一度…　もう一度だけ
私を信じて!!
column6: Please, one more time...Trust me one more time!

column5:
信じる…だと？　そんな
戯れ言　二度と聞きたくないわっ!!
column6: Trust...you say? Never again will I listen to such drivel!

column5:
最期だ……
神楽坂ユナよ…
宇宙のチリにしてくれるわ!!
column6:
This is the end...\n
Yuna Kagurazaka...\n
I will turn you into cosmic dust!

column5: かつてないパワーが……
column6: This is a power beyond any before...

column5:
どうして……
どうして分かってくれないの!?
column6:
Why...\n
Why won't she understand!?

column5:
ユナ　くるわ!!
ここは　総力戦でいくしかないわ！
column6:
Yuna, here she comes!\n
Our only option is all-out warfare!

column5: つ　強い　強すぎるわ……
column6: S-strong...Too strong...

column5: もう　動けませんですぅ〜
column6: I am no longer able to move...

column5:
ごめんなさい〜〜〜〜〜
失礼します〜〜〜〜〜
column6:
I'm sooooorry...\n
Pardon meeeeee...

column5: なんでぇー　このあたしが〜〜
column6: How could this happen to, like, ME...?

column5: 次の幕まで退散しますわ…
column6: I'll be off until the next act...

column5: 修行が足りなかったアル…
column6: My training wasn't enough, that it wasn't...

column5:
役に立てなくてごめんね…
ユナ…
column6:
I'm sorry I couldn't be helpful...\n
Yuna...

column5: 花の命は　はかないものね…
column6: How fleeting is the life of a flower...

column5: クッ　油断しましたわ……
column6: Kh! I was careless...

column5:
わたくしの演奏は
終わりのようね…
column6: It looks like my performance is over...

column5:
私をここまで
追いつめるとは…
column6: How could I be driven up to the wall like this...?

column5:
今度　会ったら
ただじゃおかないから！
column6: I'm not letting you off easy next time we meet!

column5:
ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column5:
ひどいよぉ〜
え〜ん　え〜ん…
column6:
Meanieeee!\n
Waaah! Waaah!...

column5:
もう　戦えないみたいです…
ごめんなさい…
column6:
It seems I can no longer fight...\n
I'm sorry...

column5:
あたいもヤキが
まわったもんだゼ…
column6: Guess I've lost my edge...

column5: ごめんね…　ユナ……
column6: Sorry...Yuna...

column5: まだ　あたいは歌えるよ…
column6: I can still sing...

column5: ううっ…　燃え尽きたわ…
column6: Urgh...I'm all burned out...

column5: 次は絶対に負けねえぞ…
column6: I'm sure as hell not losing next time...

column5: 私がこの程度で…
column6: For I to fall to such...

column5: ごめんね…　油断しちゃった…
column6: I'm sorry...I messed up...

column5: ひとまず　退散いたす…
column6: I shall withdraw for the present...

column5: 私の実力はこの程度では……
column6: My true power, done in by such lowliness...

column5: しまった　油断した…
column6: Damn...I was careless...

column5: あたしが　こんなやつに…
column6: How could THEY get me...?

column5: ごめんなさい…失礼します…
column6: I'm sorry...Pardon me...

column5: この私がやられるなんて……
column6: Can't believe they took ME out...

column5:
やられちゃった……
みんな　ごめんね…
column6:
I'm done for...\n
Sorry, guys...

column5:
くっ…
この私が　負けるはずは……
column6:
Kh...\n
I shouldn't be able to lose...

column5: これでも倒せないのか……
column6: Even with this, we cannot defeat her...?

column5:
玉華……
とどめを刺さぬのか……
column6:
Yui Hua...\n
Won't you deliver the finishing blow...?

column5:
今　ここで私を殺さないと
貴様は一生　後悔することになるぞ…
column6: If you do not kill me here and now, you will regret it for all your days...

column5:
クックックッ…
また　くだらん情か…
column6:
Heh-heh-heh...\n
Your foolish feelings again...

column5:
心などというものは　人を狂わせる…
情が強ければ　強いほどにな……
column6:
A ^heart~ drives a person mad...\n
The stronger one's feelings, the more so...

column5:
玉華よ　覚えておけ!!
私は何度でも　どんなことをしても
貴様の前に立ちはだかる!!
column6: Yui Hua, remember this! No matter what you do, no matter how many times you do it, I will always stand in your path!

column5: 今　それを教えてやる!!
column6: Now, I will teach you that!

column5:
そんな…
パワーが復活していく…
column6:
No...\n
Her power is being restored...

column5: 鏡明　剣鳳!!
column6: Jing Ming! Chun Fong!

column5: なりません　玉華様!!
column6: Nay, Lady Yui Hua!

column5: 今一度　考え直してください!!
column6: Please, reconsider this!

column5:
やるのです!!
鏡明　剣鳳!!

DO IT!\n
Jing Ming, Chun Fong!

無益な戦いを止めるには
これしかないのです!!

column5: 玉華様……
column6: Lady Yui Hua...

column5:
ユナさん
下がっていてください…
column6: Madam Yuna, stand back...

column5: ダメーーーーッ!!
column6: NOOOOOOOO!!

column5:
二度とこんなことは
したくなかった……
さようなら　玉鷲……

Goodbye, Yui Jiou...

column5: そんな　バカなーーーっ!!
column6: What in the hell--!?

column5: なぜ　封印が破られたの!?
column6: Why did the seal break!?

column5: あ　あれは闇の力!?
column6: Th-that's the power of darkness!?

column5: なんて　強大な……
column6: So strong...

column5:
いけない!!　みなさん
すぐに　この場を離れるのです!!
column6: No! Everybody, quickly, get away from here!

column5: 何なの　この力は!?
column6: What is this power!?

column5:
凄さまじく邪悪な力が
放出されているわ!!
column6: A truly massive evil power is being released!

column5:
大変です!!　強大な闇の
パワーがオーバーロードしています！
column6: This is terrible! The enormous dark power is overloading!

column5: あっ!?　あれを見て!!
column6: Ah!? Look at that!

column5:
ど　どーいうこと!?
玉華さんに　そっくり……
column6:
Wh-what's going on!?\n
She looks just like Miss Yui Hua...

column5:
そうです……
機械化皇帝・玉鷲と私は双子…
玉鷲は私の実の姉なのです！
column6:
Yes...\n
The Machinate Emperor, Yui Jiou, is my twin...Yui Jiou is my true older sister!

column5: ええーっ!?
column6: What!?

column5:
あわわっ[sweat]
みんなぁ！　危ないです!!
column6:
Ah-wa-wa![nbsp][sweat]\n
Everybody! Look out!!

column5: きゃあああああっ！
column6: EEEEEEEEK!

column5:
こ…こんなのと戦えっての？
冗談じゃないわよ…ったく!!
column6:

G-give me a break...SERIOUSLY!

column5:
ユナ！　このままでは
この星全体が闇に取り込まれて
しまいます!!
column6: Yuna! At this rate, the entire planet will be enveloped by the darkness!

column5:
やめてーっ!!　お願い！
昔の皇帝さんに戻ってーっ！
column6:
STOOOP! Please!\n
Go back to the old Emperor...!

だめだ!!　彼女の心は完全に
闇の力に支配されている！
column6: It is futile! Her heart is under total domination by the power of darkness!

column5:
クッ！　我らの叫びは
もう彼女には届かないのかっ!?
column6: Damn it! Do our cries no longer reach her!?

エル・ラインで　彼女の『心の闇』を
振り払うしかありません!!
column6:
Yuna! It's our last bet!\n
All we can do is force out the darkness of her heart using El-Line!

column6: Got it, Elner!

column5:
ユナさん!!
もう　やめてください!!　あなたに
もしもの事があったら…
column6:
Madam Yuna!\n
Please stop! If something happens to you...

column5:
玉華さん　あたしなら大丈夫!!
だから信じて　あたしを！
そして　玉鷲さんを!!
column6:
Miss Yui Hua, I'll be fine!\n
So trust me!\n
And Miss Yui Jiou!

column5: 絶対　絶対　元に戻してみせる!!
column6: I will[nbsp]-- absolutely WILL return her to normal!

column5:
その通りよ！
私も　あきらめないわ！
column6:
That's right!\n
I'm not giving up either!

column5:
人の心は　闇の力なんかに
負けはしない！
column6: A person's heart will never lose to the power of darkness!

column5:
あなたが彼女を信じないなら
誰が彼女の心を救うの!?
column6: If you don't believe in her, who will save her heart!?

column5:
誰よりも深い絆で結ばれた
あなたになら　わかるはず…
column6: You, who held a deeper bond with her than anyone, should understand...

column5:
彼女の心の痛み　苦しみ…
そして　哀しみが!!
column6:
The pain and suffering in her heart...\n
And the sorrow!

column5:
強く強く信じれば　絶対
想いは届くはずですぅ！　だから
負けちゃダメですぅ!!
column6: If you believe very very strongly, your feelings will definitely reach her! So you must not give in!

玉鷲さんを元に戻すのは

column5: 負けたら承知しないわよ!!

From now on, I'm going to fight too, so recognize me as one of your friends!
